mapper.select: select q.articleno, q.username, q.subject, q.content, q.regtime, a.content as reply from qusboard q left join ansboard a on q.articleno = a.articleno order by q.articleno desc

select q.articleno, q.username, q.subject, q.content, q.regtime, a.content as reply from qusboard q left join ansboard a on q.articleno = a.articleno where q.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or q.username like concat('%', #{keyword2}, '%') or q.subject like concat('%', #{keyword3}, '%') order by q.articleno desc
select articleno, username, subject, content, regtime from qusboard where articleno = #{articleno}
